titleStmt.title: The second volume conteinyng those statutes vvhiche haue ben made in the tyme of the most victoriouse reigne of Kyng Henrie the Eight with a table to the whole.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: The preliminaries only of the second volume of statutes are represented by STC (2nd ed.) 9303.7. The parts comprising the main text (one per regnal year) may be of various editions and are separately catalogued elsewhere.
Imperfect: copy at reel 1814:3 contains only t.p. and alphabetical table.
Reproduction of originals in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and Harvard University Library.
